creditline: Given in memory of Jane and Colebert Andrus
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: vase with round, but squat body on elevated foot; vertical, cylindrical neck with three raised ridges; raised ridge around C of body; flared mouth with tan glaze; magenta glaze with white, blue mottling
markings: P.C. Lu & Sons, Ltd. sticker on underside | black marker, on underside: 339
title: Bottle vase (xianwen ping)
